news.title: We're Hiring: Postdoc and 2 PhD Positions for 2026!
news.description: The CATALYST Lab is looking for a postdoc and two PhD students to join our team in 2026. We're seeking talented researchers interested in LLM theory of mind, chemical AI, game theory, or training dynamics.

news.title: Game of Thoughts Paper Accepted at AAMAS 2024
news.description: Our paper on iterative reasoning in game-theoretic domains with large language models has been accepted at the International Foundation for Autonomous Agents and Multiagent Systems conference.

news.title: Theory-of-Mind Challenges Released
news.description: We've released a new benchmark suite for testing LLM social intelligence through persuasion, trust, and strategic cooperation challenges. Available on GitHub.

news.title: Chemical Reaction Networks Paper in JCIM
news.description: Our work on modeling chemical reaction networks using neural ODEs has been published in the Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling.

news.title: Welcome to New Team Members!
news.description: We're excited to welcome several new Master's and Bachelor's students to the CATALYST Lab this fall. Welcome Fynn, Veronica, Stian, Marcellina, and Samuel!
